message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be extremely valuable to you. I understand it's worth $1,500,000 to you, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm offering it to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects the significant value this product will bring to your business, while also allowing me to achieve a fair return. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great investment. Let me know your thoughts.
